name: Slither Shot
description:
Slither Shot combines the classic genres of snake and tower defense to create a completely new experience! Using the snake, you create a path that becomes the path enemies take in a tower defense level, making each game a completely different experience from the last.

This is my first game, so any and all critiques (don't hold back) would help me as an amateur indie developer immensely! Thank you for your time.
